Description

Generic view functions that are reused in the application

User Interface for managing Staff's Created Camps

Provides utility methods to write CSV reports to files.

FileName
FilterCampsView

The FilterObj class is used to filter what details to print in a report.

ForDate Class to handle Date formatting

HelperUtil class to store support functions for other classes
LoginView
User Interface for User Login
MainView
Abstract class inherited by every View
Report
Generates report content for different report types, Only has static methods
ReportController
Manages the generation and writing of various reports, such as camp lists and performance reports.
ReportOutputType
Represents different types of report files.
ReportType
Represents different types of reports.

Staff

TxtWriter
Provides utility methods to write text reports to files.
User
User in the system
UserController
UserController class to manage User and check for user validation
UserDAO
Database file for User
WriterInterface
Defines methods for classes that write reports to files.
